name: Animals Expert Sniper
description:
Play Animals Expert Sniper new amazing hunter game simulator. Army career is over now and you decides to live inside wild jungle to become professional safari hunter. Life spend in army always comes handy in hunting. Show your professional marksman skills and sniper shooter technique to kill world’s wildest animals, like you command your army in old days, in this safari hunting game simulator.

Features:
Beautiful jungle island environment.
Enjoy realistic graphics and wild animals hunting experience.
Amazing wild life sound effects.
Sniper shooting skills required for extreme hunting.
Weapons, sniper rifle and shotgun.
